name: Mix It! (Cocoa)
description:
The Astropilots orbit black holes to harvest energy pigments by rescuing color from collapsing through the devastating gravitational forces of the black hole. 

Become a New Recruit and train to navigate your geometric space shuttle.

Avoid the meteorites, and comets, and escape the black hole by changing the color and shape of the shuttle to match the available path.

The Mobile version will be a free to play advergame, with three layers of advertising:

First, the player will learn about Anjo product features by completing the missions and earning achievement medals. Second, customizable advertising banners. Third, watch an Ad to continue. The estimated release date is: Mid 2022.

Download and play Mix It! following the links below:

(Android version) 

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1WpE2Q7yLJjmeIm8dsu6AUxAkxlFInoje/view?usp=shari...
